Key Match Events: Cubs trailed 10-3 but came back for a shocking victory
Christian Bethancourt had a monster game with multiple key hits and RBI
Pittsburgh bullpen meltdown allowed 11 runs in the 7th and 8th innings
Post-Match Reflections: Cubs scored 41 runs over the three-game sweep
The victory provided a flicker of hope for the team's playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game lasted well into extra innings
Christian Bethancourt became a superhero against the Cubs with his performance
Cubs' bats feasted on a struggling Pirates pitching staff
